reference.title: euscale-describe-metric-collection-types
reference.shortdesc: Returns a list of all metric collection and metric granularity types.

section.title: Options
section.p: This command has no specific options.

section.title: Output
section.p: This command returns a table that contains the following:

section.title: Examples
section.p: This command returns output similar to the following.
section.codeblock: METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupDesiredCapacity METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupInServiceInstances METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupMaxSize METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupMinSize METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupPendingInstances METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupTerminatingInstances METRIC-COLLECTION-TYPE GroupTotalInstances METRIC-GRANULARITY-TYPE 1Minute
